#summary Introduction to the Apollo-WS Client
#labels Phase-Design

= Introduction =

The Apollo-WS Client is a simple web front-end to Apollo-WS written in PHP. This client enables end users to access Apollo-WS from any machine with a web browser and internet connect, with no software download required.
